mapper.insert: insert into profile_inbox (pkid, title, type, userid, fromuserid, status, createtime, content,outboxid,readtime,fromtype) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{outboxid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{readtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{fromtype,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update profile_inbox set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fromuserid = #{fromuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, readtime = #{readtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, outboxid = #{outboxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fromtype = #{fromtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, title, type, userid, fromuserid, status, createtime, content, outboxid,readtime,fromtype from profile_inbox
